name: The Dreamer: Snowbattle minigame
description:
This is the first minigame of The Dreamer project.

In this minigame you will be able to challenge your friends in a snowbattle!!

Quick, grab a snowball and throw it to your friends before their snowballs hit you!

[this is only a two player minigame].

Stay tuned for updates on the way!

Dreaming Soul Games
